# Stealth YouTube Player - Next.js 14 App Router

## Project Overview
Stealth YouTube Player application for listening to videos at school/work with privacy mode enabled by default.

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Authentication: NextAuth.js (Auth.js) with Google Provider
- Player: react-youtube library
- TypeScript for type safety

## Key Features
- Google OAuth authentication
- Privacy mode enabled by default (video hidden behind black overlay)
- Custom overlay controls (Play/Pause, Volume, Progress Bar)
- YouTube video playback via URL input

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router conventions
- Implement server components where possible
- Use client components for interactive features
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
